verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> you the LORD. <WH3050> O give thanks <WH3034> to the LORD; <WH3068> for he is good: <WH2896> for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever. <WH5769>
Who <WH4310> can utter <WH4448> the mighty <WH1369> acts of the LORD? <WH3068> who can show <WH8085> forth all <WH3605> his praise? <WH8416>
Blessed <WH835> are they that keep <WH8104> judgment, <WH4941> and he that does <WH6213> righteousness <WH6666> at all <WH3605> times. <WH6256>
Remember <WH2142> me, O LORD, <WH3068> with the favor <WH7522> that you bore to your people: <WH5971> O visit <WH6485> me with your salvation; <WH3444>

That I may see <WH7200> the good <WH2896> of your chosen, <WH972> that I may rejoice <WH8055> in the gladness <WH8057> of your nation, <WH1471> that I may glory <WH1984> with your inheritance. <WH5159>
We have sinned <WH2398> with our fathers, <WH1> we have committed <WH5753> iniquity, <WH5753> we have done <WH6213> wickedly. <WH7561>

Our fathers <WH1> understood <WH7919> not your wonders <WH6381> in Egypt; <WH4714> they remembered <WH2142> not the multitude <WH7230> of your mercies; <WH2617> but provoked <WH4784> him at <WH5921> the sea, <WH3220> even at <WH5921> the Red <WH5488> sea. <WH3220>
Nevertheless he saved <WH3467> them for his name's <WH8034> sake, <WH4616> that he might make his mighty <WH1369> power <WH1369> to be known. <WH3045>
He rebuked <WH1605> the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220> also, and it was dried <WH2717> up: so he led <WH3212> them through the depths, <WH8415> as through the wilderness. <WH4057>
And he saved <WH3467> them from the hand <WH3027> of him that hated <WH8130> them, and redeemed <WH1350> them from the hand <WH3027> of the enemy. <WH341>
And the waters <WH4325> covered <WH3680> their enemies: <WH6862> there was not one <WH259> of them left. <WH3498>
Then believed <WH539> they his words; <WH1697> they sang <WH7891> his praise. <WH8416>
They soon <WH4116> forgot <WH7911> his works; <WH4639> they waited <WH2442> not for his counsel: <WH6098>
But lusted <WH183> exceedingly in the wilderness, <WH4057> and tempted <WH5254> God <WH410> in the desert. <WH3452>
And he gave <WH5414> them their request; <WH7596> but sent <WH7971> leanness <WH7332> into their soul. <WH5315>
They envied <WH7065> Moses <WH4872> also in the camp, <WH4264> and Aaron <WH175> the saint <WH6918> of the LORD. <WH3068>
The earth <WH776> opened <WH6605> and swallowed <WH1104> up Dathan <WH1885>and covered <WH3680> the company <WH5712> of Abiram. <WH48>
And a fire <WH784> was kindled <WH1197> in their company; <WH5712> the flame <WH3852> burned <WH3857> up the wicked. <WH7563>
They made <WH6213> a calf <WH5695> in Horeb, <WH2722> and worshipped <WH7812> the molten <WH4541> image.
Thus they changed <WH4171> their glory <WH3519> into the similitude <WH8403> of an ox <WH7794> that eats <WH398> grass. <WH6212>
They forgot <WH7911> God <WH410> their savior, <WH3467> which had done great <WH1419> things in Egypt; <WH4714>
Wondrous <WH6381> works in the land <WH776> of Ham, <WH2526> and terrible <WH3372> things by the Red <WH5488> sea. <WH3220>

Therefore he said <WH559> that he would destroy <WH8045> them, had <WH3884> not Moses <WH4872> his chosen <WH972> stood <WH5975> before <WH6440> him in the breach, <WH6556> to turn <WH7725> away his wrath, <WH2534> lest he should destroy <WH7843> them.
Yes, they despised <WH3988> the pleasant <WH2532> land, <WH776> they believed <WH539> not his word: <WH1697>
But murmured <WH7279> in their tents, <WH168> and listened <WH8085> not to the voice <WH6963> of the LORD. <WH3068>
Therefore he lifted <WH5375> up his hand <WH3027> against them, to overthrow <WH5307> them in the wilderness: <WH4057>
To overthrow <WH5307> their seed <WH2233> also among the nations, <WH1471> and to scatter <WH2219> them in the lands. <WH776>
They joined <WH6775> themselves also to Baalpeor, <WH1187> and ate <WH398> the sacrifices <WH2077> of the dead. <WH4191>
Thus they provoked him to anger <WH3707> with their inventions: <WH4611> and the plague <WH4046> broke <WH6555> in on them.
Then stood <WH5975> up Phinehas, <WH6372> and executed judgment: <WH6419> and so the plague <WH4046> was stayed. <WH6113>
And that was counted <WH2803> to him for righteousness <WH6666> to all generations <WH1755> for ever more. <WH5769>
They angered <WH7107> him also at <WH5921> the waters <WH4325> of strife, <WH4808> so that it went ill <WH3415> with Moses <WH4872> for their sakes: <WH5668>
Because <WH3588> they provoked <WH4784> his spirit, <WH7307> so that he spoke <WH981> unadvisedly <WH981> with his lips. <WH8193>
They did not destroy <WH8045> the nations, <WH5971> concerning whom <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH559> them:
But were mingled <WH6148> among the heathen, <WH1471> and learned <WH3925> their works. <WH4639>
And they served <WH5647> their idols: <WH6091> which were a snare <WH4170> to them.
Yes, they sacrificed <WH2076> their sons <WH1121> and their daughters <WH1323> to devils, <WH7700>

And shed <WH8210> innocent <WH5355> blood, <WH1818> even the blood <WH1818> of their sons <WH1121> and of their daughters, <WH1323> whom <WH834> they sacrificed <WH2076> to the idols <WH6091> of Canaan: <WH3667> and the land <WH776> was polluted <WH2610> with blood. <WH1818>
Thus were they defiled <WH2930> with their own works, <WH4639> and went a whoring <WH2181> with their own inventions. <WH4611>
Therefore was the wrath <WH639> of the LORD <WH3068> kindled <WH2734> against his people, <WH5971> so that he abhorred <WH8581> his own inheritance. <WH5159>
And he gave <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of the heathen; <WH1471> and they that hated <WH8130> them ruled <WH4910> over them.
Their enemies <WH341> also oppressed <WH3905> them, and they were brought <WH3665> into subjection <WH3665> under <WH8478> their hand. <WH3027>
Many <WH7227> times <WH6471> did he deliver <WH5337> them; but they provoked <WH4784> him with their counsel, <WH6098> and were brought <WH4355> low <WH4355> for their iniquity. <WH5771>
Nevertheless he regarded <WH7200> their affliction, <WH6862> when he heard <WH8085> their cry: <WH7440>
And he remembered <WH2142> for them his covenant, <WH1285> and repented <WH5162> according to the multitude <WH7230> of his mercies. <WH2617>
He made <WH5414> them also to be pitied <WH7356> of all those that carried <WH7617> them captives. <WH7617>

Save <WH3467> us, O LORD <WH3068> our God, <WH430> and gather <WH6908> us from among the heathen, <WH1471> to give thanks <WH3034> to your holy <WH6944> name, <WH8034> and to triumph <WH7623> in your praise. <WH8416>

Blessed <WH1288> be the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> from everlasting <WH5769> to everlasting: <WH5769> and let all the people <WH5971> say, <WH559> Amen. <WH543> Praise <WH1984> you the LORD. <WH3050>
